channel.title: How come people cant connect to my no-ip?
channel.description:
I port forwarded and i know this worked because when i log in my server without typing in any ip it logs me in, but when someone tried to log in using my no-ip they get error connecting to server... Anyone know how to fix this?
Jake

item.title: How come people cant connect to my no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

put ‘don’t allow exceptions’ off, if that doesn’t work, port forward, then make a ip at no-ip.com

Read full topic
item.source: How come people cant connect to my no-ip?

item.title: How come people cant connect to my no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

I port forwarded and i know this worked because when i log in my server without typing in any ip it logs me in

just because you logged in doesnt mean that you portforwarded correctly. If you didnt portforward you will still be able to connect to your server.

Read full topic
item.source: How come people cant connect to my no-ip?

item.title: How come people cant connect to my no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @welly141 welly141
item.description:
@welly141 wrote:

Have you tried putting the no-ip and the port number to your firewall.

Read full topic
